thread.title: Get Your Best Tie-Dye Cap Because There Is Going To Be A Remake Of ‘White Men Can’t Jump’ With Blake Griffin
thread.title_full: Get Your Best Tie-Dye Cap Because There Is Going To Be A Remake Of ‘White Men Can’t Jump’ With Blake Griffin

author: paulsacca
title: Get Your Best Tie-Dye Cap Because There Is Going To Be A Remake Of ‘White Men Can’t Jump’ With Blake Griffin
text:
20th Century Fox

Hey hey man, are you excited for a White Men Can’t Jump remake? Yo! Chump! I’m talking to you! Well get excited because it is definitely happening. The Hollywood Reporter confirms that the greatest pick-up basketball movie is getting a remake. The script for the update of the sports comedy classic will be written by Kenya Barris, the creator of ABC’s Black-ish , who is teaming with Blake Griffin of the Los Angeles Clippers and Ryan Kalil of the Carolina Panthers.
The 1992 baller flick featured Woody Harrelson and Wesley Snipes trying to hustle the hustler where we learned that you can put a cat in an oven, but that don’t make it a biscuit and that your mom was an astronaut. 
You know Kevin Hart is going to be Sidney Deane right? Put your money on that. 
Better start researching what foods begin with the letter Q.
